freezeTip.message: The system has detected that this account has cheating/improper behaviors in {names} . The account is locked. Please contact your teacher or platform admin.

overErrorTimes.message: You have tried 5 times and the account is locked. Please retry after 3 minutes.

faceSuccess.message: Your face identity is verified and the exam will start in 3 seconds.

noCameraTip.message: The camera is in use or access to it is denied. Please close the camera use by other programs and /or allow camera access by ULearning.

notSupportTip.message: This exam does not support web participation. Please use the type of exam device specified to take the exam.

noFaceTip.message: Face verification is enabled for this exam, and you can start the exam after completing face verification.

lateLimitTip.message: Not allowed to take the exam after {time} minutes from the start of the exam

submitLimitType.message: The exam is not allowed to submit within {min} after the exam starts

deviceMonitorTip.message: {deviceMonitor} is on - Do not switch to another device or browser during the exam!

ipMonitorTip.message: {ipMonitor} is on - Do not switch to another network during the exam!

cutScreenMonitorTip1.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is on - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App for more than {s} seconds in a single switch or for more than {count} times!

cutScreenMonitorTip2.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is no - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App more than {count} times!

cutScreenMonitorTip3.message: {cutScreenMonitor} is on - The exam will be submitted involuntarily if the students switch from the exam screen to another screen/App for more than {s} seconds in a single switch!

faceMonitorTip.message: {faceMonitor} is on - Need to pass face verification to start the exam!

cameraMonitorTip.message: {cameraMonitor} is on - Keep the front-facing camera on all the time through the exam!

noPermissionTip.message: You are not authorized to take this exam. If you have any questions, please contact the exam organizer.

multipleSessions.message: This exam contains multiple sessions. Please log in to view the sessions and exam time you can   participate in.

deviceAbnormalityTip.message: The device monitoring is on and you are not allowed to change the device or browser during the exam. Please use the device or browser that entered the exam for the first time to answer the questions.

ipAbnormalityTip.message: IP monitoring is on. Students are not allowed to switch to another network during the exam (Switching the network may cause the IP address to change).

useCodeTip.message: If you need to change the device/browser under special circumstances, please ask the proctor for the verification code, and {useCode} to enter the exam.

faceVerificationTip.message: You have not completed the face verification and cannot take the exam via face verification.

useCodeEnter.message: Use the verification code to enter the exam

agreenExamNotes.message: I have read and agree to the items in the exam instructions

faceVerificationDesc.message: Please face the camera and make sure there is enough light. Can't perform face verification?

examCodeTip.message: Ask your teacher or proctor for the verification code and enter the code below.

cameraMonitorDesc.message: After the camera monitoring is turned on, the system will detect and record your suspicious behaviors such as leaving seat, deviated eye focus, talking with others, etc. Please make sure:  {br}1. Adjust the camera as needed so that your head/face fully appear in the camera view when you are sitting in front of the exam device to take the exam. {br}2. During the exam, focus your eyes on the exam screen, do not leave the seat, and do not talk with others.

joinTypes.message: PC Web / ULearning APP / ULearning Lockdown Browser

resultsNotAnnounce.message: The results of this exam won’t be posted.

resultsNotYetAnnounce.message: Results have not yet been posted

ipPermissionsTip.message: Current IP {ip} does not have access to the exam -  Please use the specified device to take the exam!

lateTip.message: You are not allowed to take the exam since you have passed the permitted late start time.

noCameraTip1.message: Face verification is turned on for this exam and please use a device with a front-facing camera to take the exam.

noCameraTip2.message: Camera monitoring is turned on for this exam and please use a device with a front-facing camera to take the exam.

examNotStart.message: The exam is not started yet

expireTip.message: Login timed out, please log in again!

ltiTip1.message: If you need to take the exam via ULearning APP or ULearning Lockdown Browser, you can log in with your U-Test account. Your username is: {loginName}, and the initial password is the same as the username.

ltiTip2.message: If you need to take the exam via ULearning APP or ULearning Lockdown Browser, you can log in with your U-Test account. Your username is: {loginName}, and the initial password is the same as the username. You can modify your password after loggin in.

accountTipContent.message: Welcome to ULearning Exam System. We have registered a ULearning account for you. If you need to take the exam via mobile phone, please download ULearning APP and login with your ULearning account.

passwordTip.message: The initial password is the same as your username, you can modify your password after loggin in.

openAppTip.message: If the ULearning APP is not launched successfully, please check whether it is installed. If it is not yet installed, please download and install it first.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete it?

transcodeTip.message: The file is being transcoded, please try again later.

transcodeTip1.message: The file is being transcoded, please try again later

recordingTip.message: There is another audio recording in progress, please close it first.

noRecordingTip.message: Recording permission has been denied, please turn on recording permission in your browser settings.

uploadAudioFail.message: Audio upload failed, please check the network connection.

uploadFileError3.message: This type of file is not supported.

playTimesError.message: Parameter error. The playback times is incorrect.

answerCanChangeTip.message: The answers for the blanks do not need to be in order.

inputFormulaTip.message: Click the formula icon on the right to enter the formula

inputAnaly.message: Click to enter the answer explanation

inputAnalyTip.message: The answer explanation cannot exceed  {n} characters

optionContentTip1.message: Click to enter the choice or delete the extra choices

inputAnswerTip1.message: The answer can not be empty!

questionTitleTip1.message: The question can not be empty!

insertBlankTip.message: Hit the Tab key also allows you to insert a fill-in-the-blank item

answerTip.message: The answers for the blanks do not need to be in order.

guide1.message: Welcome to the new version of the exam editor. Let's take a look at the changes.

guide2.message: On the left , you can add, move and delete exam sections. Click the section title to switch to the corresponding section.

guide3.message: Click here to modify the section title and description.

guide4.message: In this new version, you can create and edit questions in the exam directly ! Select a question type here to add a new question. Of course, you can also import questions from the question bank.

guide5.message: Note: new questions created here will not be automatically saved to the question bank. If necessary, you can use the Import from Exam function in the question bank to import the questions from the exam into the question bank.

guide6.message: Batch setting of score and audio playback times, moved here.

guide7.message: Click here to preview the exam when editing.

guide8.message: Remember to click Save after all editing.

paperUsedTip.message: This exam is in use. Only the content, answers and scores of the questions can be modified. The structure of the sections cannot be modified, or the questions can be added or deleted. Combination Questions are not allowed to add or delete sub-questions.
